CraftData.Description: Collects a low amount of energy during the day
CraftData.Hint: Requires sky clearance!

CraftData.Description: Automatically moves resources between hoppers
CraftData.Hint: Cheap and nasty, but reliable* *Not that reliable really.

CraftData.Description: Burns resources for energy.
CraftData.Hint: Must be connected to a Storage Hopper

CraftData.Description: Low-grade steel alloy
CraftData.Hint: Crafting Ingredient for more advanced machines

CraftData.Description: Massive horizontal mining laser
CraftData.Hint: Use to bore out straight tunnels

CraftData.Description: Transmit power at a low rate
CraftData.Hint: Maximum range : 64

CraftData.Description: Stores up to 250 power
CraftData.Hint: Connect to machines to power them

CraftData.Description: Stores up to 1,500 power
CraftData.Hint: Connect to machines to power them

CraftData.Description: Stores up to 5000 power
CraftData.Hint: Connect to machines to power them

CraftData.Description: Automatically extracts ore
CraftData.Hint: Connect to Hoppers for automatic storage

CraftData.Description: The centre of your base's power network!
CraftData.Hint: Combines combustion and solar energy

CraftData.Description: Stores upto 100 resources
CraftData.Hint: Can be connected to other machines for automation

CraftData.Description: Stores upto 10 resources.
CraftData.Hint: Disperses resources very slowly.

CraftData.Description: Low grade heating and lighting.
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Fire is hot!

CraftData.Description: A slightly stronger wall for your base.
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up 10 Rough Hewn Rock!

CraftData.Description: A slightly stronger wall for your base.
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up Wooden Planks!

CraftData.Description: A weak window, has wooden frames
CraftData.Hint: Uses up wooden planks!

CraftData.Description: Useful for looking into the guts of your base
CraftData.Hint: It's seethrough!

CraftData.Description: Use this to mark off dangerous areas.
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up 1 RoughHewnRock!

CraftData.Description: Use this to mark off dangerous areas.
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up 1 RoughHewnRock!

CraftData.Description: Decorative wooden blocks
CraftData.Hint: Pretty!

CraftData.Description: Alien-esque wall decoration
CraftData.Hint: Uses up some of that useless chitin!

CraftData.Description: Test Recipe, research cost but no project
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up 10 Rough Hewn Rock!

CraftData.Description: Test Recipe, research project but no cost
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up 10 Rough Hewn Rock!

CraftData.Description: Test Recipe, research cost and project
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up 1 RoughHewnRock!

CraftData.Description: Test Recipe, scan requirement
CraftData.Hint: It's actually just white canvas with leaves rubbed on

CraftData.Description: Move Resources between StorageHoppers
CraftData.Hint: Rapid Transfer, high Energy cost

CraftData.Description: Smelts resources into Bars
CraftData.Hint: T2 item - use the one at your base to start with!

CraftData.Description: Increases power usage and smelting rate.
CraftData.Hint: Place on top of your Ore Smelter!

CraftData.Description: Increases power usage and smelting rate.
CraftData.Hint: Place on top of your Ore Smelter!

CraftData.Description: Increases power usage and smelting rate.
CraftData.Hint: Place on top of your Ore Smelter!

CraftData.Description: Basic Energy-based defence.
CraftData.Hint: Do not place on top of your Ore Smelter!

CraftData.Description: Transfers materials to and from Hoppers
CraftData.Hint: Slow but efficient

CraftData.Description: Filters the transfer of materials
CraftData.Hint: Place between hoppers and conveyors

CraftData.Description: Transfers materials to and from Hoppers
CraftData.Hint: Can be used on walls and ceilings

CraftData.Description: Filters the transfer of materials
CraftData.Hint: Can be used on walls and ceilings

CraftData.Description: Automatically rotates after traferring items
CraftData.Hint: Use to split conveyor lines

CraftData.Description: Automatically converts Bars into Plates
CraftData.Hint: A useful start when automating

CraftData.Description: Automatically converts Bars into Wire
CraftData.Hint: A useful start when automating

CraftData.Description: Automatically converts Wire into Coils
CraftData.Hint: A useful start when automating

CraftData.Description: Automatically converts Coils into PCBs
CraftData.Hint: PCBs are used in many electronic components

CraftData.Description: Upgrade module for the manufacturing plant
CraftData.Hint: Allows creation of suit upgrades

CraftData.Description: Increases Suit Solar Efficiency
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1

CraftData.Description: Increases Suit Heating Power
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1

CraftData.Description: Increases Suit Power Capacity
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1

CraftData.Description: Increases Suit Headlight Efficiency
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1

CraftData.Description: Can dig through more materials than your starting build gun. Can dismantle Ore Smelters and Manufacturing Plants
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: Crafting this allows your suit to filter out dangerous and hallucinogenic toxins from the atmosphere.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to progress past the poison-spore filled caves

CraftData.Description: Allows the use of jet thrust to fly over short ranges. Uses large amounts of power. Activate with 'J'.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: Transmits power upto 64m
CraftData.Hint: Tier 2 version transmits more power!

CraftData.Description: 10x as rapid energy transfer as T2.
CraftData.Hint: The largest single-block energy transmitter.

CraftData.Description: A simple wooden crate that can store a small amount of items. Cannot be automated.
CraftData.Hint: Connect multiple crates together to increase available inventory space.

CraftData.Description: Common component for tier 3 machinery
CraftData.Hint: Can also be used for construction.

CraftData.Description: Process Biomass into useful products.
CraftData.Hint: Must be connected to a Refinery Reactor Vat to operate.

CraftData.Description: A small part of a Refinery Reactor Vat.
CraftData.Hint: Place in a 3 by 3 by 3 configuration to form a valid Reactor Vat.

CraftData.Description: Housing component for a Jet Turbine Generator. Burns HEC Fuel to drive a turbine generating lots of power.
CraftData.Hint: Build in a 4 by 3 horizontal shape, and build 3 high. Attach an intake to form the front of the machine.

CraftData.Description: Sucks in large amounts of air for the turbine. Forms the front of the generator.
CraftData.Hint: The Turbine Generator intake is placed at the front of the housing in a 3 by 3 vertical shape.

CraftData.Description: MK1 movement module for ARTHER
CraftData.Hint: Allows ARTHER to move reliably again

CraftData.Description: MK1 battery module for ARTHER
CraftData.Hint: Allows ARTHER to collect more power

CraftData.Description: MK1 solar module for ARTHER
CraftData.Hint: Allows ARTHER to collect power faster

CraftData.Description: Basic Drill Motor
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 200%. Press R on Ore Extractor to install

CraftData.Description: Enhanced Drill Motor
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 400%

CraftData.Description: Magnetic Drill Motor
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 800%

CraftData.Description: Fusion Drill Motor
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 1600%

CraftData.Description: Antimatter Drill Motor
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 3200%

CraftData.Description: Ore Extractor upgrade that increases Extractor efficiency. Allows harvesting tougher materials.
CraftData.Hint: Higher efficiency means an extractor can last longer on an ore vein. It does not increase extraction speed.

CraftData.Description: Modular upgrade for all Laser Power Transmitters
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 15%

CraftData.Description: Modular upgrade for all Laser Power Transmitters
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 30%

CraftData.Description: Modular upgrade for all Laser Power Transmitters
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 50%

CraftData.Description: Modular upgrade for all Laser Power Transmitters
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 90%

CraftData.Description: Modular upgrade for all Laser Power Transmitters
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 150%

CraftData.Description: Modular upgrade for all Laser Power Transmitters
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 200%

CraftData.Description: Fine Copper wire, used for delicate electronics.
CraftData.Hint: Currently lacking insulation.

CraftData.Description: Thin metal plates, used for the outside of lightweight objects.
CraftData.Hint: Not to be used for heavy-duty machines!

CraftData.Description: Bevelled gear, used in various motors and joints.
CraftData.Hint: Bevelled as it's quieter!

CraftData.Description: Empty metal tube.
CraftData.Hint: Combine with other items to create useful parts

CraftData.Description: Empty fuel canister.
CraftData.Hint: Be green - recyle after use!

CraftData.Description: Accurate and fast motor.
CraftData.Hint: Minimal torque.

CraftData.Description: A small metal boxed, used in lightweight objects.
CraftData.Hint: Not to be used for heavy-duty machines!

CraftData.Description: Mass Storage Facility. Place on a horizontal plane.
CraftData.Hint: Unlimited Storage. Use I/O ports to access the contents!

CraftData.Description: Mass Storage Facility. Place on a horizontal plane.
CraftData.Hint: Unlimited Storage. Use I/O ports to access the contents!

CraftData.Description: Mass Storage Facility. Place on a horizontal plane.
CraftData.Hint: Unlimited Storage. Use I/O ports to access the contents!

CraftData.Description: Macerator crushes and disposes of unwanted rock
CraftData.Hint: Has a small chance to produce ore.

CraftData.Description: Automatically digs a 5x5 vertical corridor.
CraftData.Hint: Does not affect ores.

CraftData.Description: Places items from attached Storage Hopper along cardinal directions.
CraftData.Hint: Why build your own conveyor lines when a machine can do it for you?

CraftData.Description: Manufacturing Plants allow automated crafting and building.
CraftData.Hint: Requires V2 Build Gun to move!

CraftData.Description: Use on selected location to store in marker. Can be used in various machines that use a target location.
CraftData.Hint: Selecting the marker on your hotbar will show its stored location

CraftData.Description: Use on selected location to store in marker. Can be used in various machines that use a target location.
CraftData.Hint: Selecting the marker on your hotbar will show its stored location

CraftData.Description: Use on selected location to store in marker. Can be used in various machines that use a target location.
CraftData.Hint: Selecting the marker on your hotbar will show its stored location

CraftData.Description: Supply a location marker and enough power to allow teleporting
CraftData.Hint: Jump on top of the device to activate!

CraftData.Description: Supply power to increase explosion radius. Keeps charge when picked up.
CraftData.Hint: Requires charging with power before use!

CraftData.Description: A consumable item that generates an ore ping without power cost.
CraftData.Hint: Combine with a piece of ore to create specific ore pings

CraftData.Description: A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Coal Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Iron Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Copper Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Tin Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Lithium Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Gold Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Nickel Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Titanium Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Crystal Deposit without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Biomass Growth without power cost.
Slow and efficient vertical transport./nAttached from the underside.
CraftData.Hint: Can be upgraded using Lift Accelerators.

CraftData.Description: Slow and efficient vertical transport./nAttached from the underside.
CraftData.Hint: Can be upgraded using Lift Accelerators.

CraftData.Description: Slow and efficient vertical transport./nAttached from the underside.
CraftData.Hint: Can be upgraded using Lift Accelerators.

CraftData.Description: Automatically moves ore between conveyors.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to organise your ore conveyors.

CraftData.Description: A low clock PCB.
CraftData.Hint: Used in electronic devices.

CraftData.Description: Copper-based housing.
CraftData.Hint: Use to house low-level items safely.

CraftData.Description: A low-level Experimental Pod.
CraftData.Hint: Use to unlock Projects

CraftData.Description: Gives a report on available resources
CraftData.Hint: Use to determine the best place for your Quarry!

CraftData.Description: Automatically digs a 10x10x1024 hole and returns all resources
CraftData.Hint: Also returns all the dirt and rock...

CraftData.Description: Automatically assemble Research Pods
CraftData.Hint: Use to unlock Projects!

CraftData.Description: Use this to Research advanced Projects with Experiments.
CraftData.Hint: The Laboratory is built in a 3x3x3 shape.
